description: This file defines a service class 'SearchService' that provides search functionalities over document data stored in a database, including filtering by user, query string, category, and tags.

classes.name: SearchService
classes.description: A service class for performing database searches over documents and their latest OCR text versions.

methods.name: List[Document] search_documents(self, user_id: int, query: Optional[str] = None, category: Optional[str] = None, tag: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 25, offset: int = 0)
methods.description: Searches for documents belonging to a user, with optional filtering by query text, category, and tags, supporting pagination via limit and offset.

ctags.name: search_documents
ctags.pattern: /^    def search_documents(self, user_id: int, query: Optional[str] = None, category: Optional[str/
ctags.signature: (self, user_id: int, query: Optional[str] = None, category: Optional[str] = None, tag: Optional[str] = None, limit: int = 25, offset: int = 0)
